articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Some of the best cannabis strains we enjoy today migrated from the growers and seed banks of Canada. Since the 1990s when cannabis activism was revived with the opening of “hemp stores,” Canada has been a hotspot for new crossbred varieties.
Here are some of Leafly’s newcomers:
1. Blue God
Characteristics of Blue God:

100% indica
Breeder: Jordan of the Islands
Cross between God Bud and Blueberry
Berry aroma
Offers full-body relief
May help with pain and sleep disorders
Soil preferred for growing
55-60 day flowering time

2. Lethal Purple
Characteristics of Lethal Purple:

80% indica
Breeder: Great White North
Floral aroma
Offers full-body relief with mental clarity

3. Endless Sky
Characteristics of Endless Sky:

90% indica
Breeder: Greenthumb Seeds
Cross between Grenadine and Iranian landrace
Earthy, hashy aroma
Offers spacey, dreamy effects
Hydroponics preferred for growing
42-50 day flowering time

4. Lowryder
Characteristics of Lowryder:

Hybrid
Breeder: Joint Doctor Seeds
Cross between Ruderalis and Northern Lights #2 x William’s Wonder 
Dwarf-sized plant that grows no higher than 40cm
Earthy aroma
Slow onset with balanced head and body effects
Hardy plants with a 40-45 day flowering time

5. Sapphire Star
Characteristics of Sapphire Star:

60% sativa
Breeder: Jordan of the Islands
Cross between Blue Hawaiian sativa and God Bud
Berry, skunky aroma
Cerebrally energizing, physically calming
49-56 day flowering time

photo credit: Ian Muttoo via photopin cc
articles.title: Five New Cannabis Strains with Canadian Origins

description: Sapphire Star, a cross between Blue Hawaiian sativa and God Bud, is a hybrid whose genetics and cerebral effects tip slightly toward the sativa side. This strain from Jordan of the Islands is quite possibly named for its bluish accents and starry coat of white crystal trichomes. Cerebral energy balanced by an indica calm create a comfortable psychoactive experience conducive for creative and social activities. Berry overtones tinged with a sour skunk aroma build a complex flavor profile for the small dense buds. Sapphire Star, with a flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks, grows to a towering 15 feet outdoors and up to 6 feet in indoor gardens.
descriptionPlain: Sapphire Star, a cross between Blue Hawaiian sativa and God Bud, is a hybrid whose genetics and cerebral effects tip slightly toward the sativa side. This strain from Jordan of the Islands is quite possibly named for its bluish accents and starry coat of white crystal trichomes. Cerebral energy balanced by an indica calm create a comfortable psychoactive experience conducive for creative and social activities. Berry overtones tinged with a sour skunk aroma build a complex flavor profile for the small dense buds. Sapphire Star, with a flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks, grows to a towering 15 feet outdoors and up to 6 feet in indoor gardens.

highlightedReviews.text: One of the best buds I've had in a while. Smoked a ton, ate a buffet and I was still high af. Then I went to work and I was still high yet very competent and focused. So A+ on this strain. I need it more often lol.

Definitely not for me. The smoke was nice and smooth, bud was grown well, just didn’t hit hard. Nice relaxed feeling and more uplifted but completely functional. Perfect for beginners! Disappointing for stoners who need a heavy-hitter.

name: Sapphire Star
